body: This appears to be a piece of silver or gold jewelry used to fasten a cloak or cape. In addition to this mundane task, it can absorb magic missiles of the sort generated by the spell or spell-like ability. A brooch can absorb up to 101 points of damage from magic missiles before it melts and becomes useless.
name: Brooch of Shielding
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Neck/Neck Slot Wondrous Items/Brooch of Shielding
